original_text: And the elders of Gilead said to Jephthah, “That is why we have turned to you now, that you may go with us and fight against the Ammonites and be our head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.”
korean_text: 그러므로 길르앗 장로들이 입다에게 이르되 이제 우리가 당신을 찾아온 것은 우리와 함께 가서 암몬 자손과 싸우게 하려 함이니 그리하면 당신이 우리 길르앗 모든 주민의 머리가 되리라 하매

sentences.original_text: And the elders of Gilead said to Jephthah,
“That is why we have turned to you now,
that you may go with us
and be our head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.”
sentences.korean_translation: 길르앗 모든 주민의 우두머리가 되게 하려 함이라.”
